body:
With the new M1 arm based macOS, I am getting:
```console
% spack install -j8 binutils
sysctl: unknown oid 'machdep.cpu.leaf7_features'
sysctl: unknown oid 'machdep.cpu.vendor'
sysctl: unknown oid 'machdep.cpu.model'
sysctl: unknown oid 'machdep.cpu.leaf7_features'
sysctl: unknown oid 'machdep.cpu.vendor'
sysctl: unknown oid 'machdep.cpu.model'
```
I am using spack git version 839af2bd700211f4f38a99f98c099f8f8c4e5a09.
title: `sysctl: unknown oid 'machdep.cpu.model'` on arm macOS (M1)
